reviewText: I bought this movie set for my 4year old son. The description made it sound like it wasDisney's Toy Story movie (Christmas special). If this is what you are looking for, do NOT buy this. It was an OLD 1960's animated movie that had horrible picture&sound that was not digitally restored. There was no plot and no dialogue. It was just a low grade cartoon with music in the background. The Dear Santa movie was appropriate for a child that still believes in Santa, so I would not allow him to even watch that one! A total waste of money!!!
